title: Noddy goes to school
creator_credit: Brian Cosgrove, Mark Hall, CPL and Stop Frame Productions
brief_description: Based on the Noddy stories by Enid Blyton. A series of incidents cause Noddy to come to the realisation that he should go to school to learn to read. Narrated by Richard Briers.
creator_credit_for_label: Brian Cosgrove, Mark Hall, CPL and Stop Frame Productions
